lender.occupation: A servant to anyone in need.
lender.loan_because: Sharing is a gift..

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: I wish that I could do more.

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe people simply want to make something great with their life
lender.occupational_info: Create stories transforming what people know, believe, fear... into codes they can understand and that will make them buy my client products

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping less fortunate individuals and families.

lender.loan_because: I want to help with economic development in places not so fortunate as us
lender.occupational_info: I develop websites for clients who are wanting to expand their online operations and have their website make a difference to their bottom line.

lender.name: Cigalou
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of charity and helping others

lender.name: Fort Plain Central Store
lender.loan_because: as the operators of the school store, we took out a loan to get our business started. We wanted to do the same for someone else!

lender.name: Astrid
lender.loan_because: because sometimes people need just a bit to start.

lender.name: Janiele
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power and energy of people
lender.occupational_info: I am a structural engineer. I assist in making buildings stronger and safer.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me & I want to share His love and blessings with others.

lender.name: Janet & Marvin
lender.loan_because: We loan because we have been so blessed. We feel that everyone is equal and we are all brothers and sisters.
lender.occupational_info: Marvin works in a sawmill that produces lumber and pallet. I (Janet) work in an office and assist Office Mangers in Billing.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that a little amount of money to me, can be a tremendous amount to someone else. Every bit counts!

lender.name: Mary Ellen
lender.loan_because: I want others to benefit from the good fortune I've had in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make the lives of with people with AIDS better.

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: As Christians, we are called to care for one another. I especially like Kiva, because I can help people all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I provide translation between business folks and technical folks. I work with the business folks to find out what tasks they want computer systems to accomplish. I work with the technical folks to make them aware of the business folks' needs. I help both sides understand one another.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe in the good will of all mankind and want to give those less fortunate than me a chance at steady income and supporting their families.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money to find a cure for diabetes and to help those living with the disease

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because:
I have seen the entrepreneurial spirit in people throughout Africa and other places. People with nearly nothing trying to make a better life through business.
If $25 will help lift them up and give them a chance, I will risk the money.
We are all one people on this planet, we must help one another where we can.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a merchant marine. I help stear ships across the worlds oceans.
We move all kinds of products from country to country, mostly I have sailed on ships delevering US Food Aid to Africa.
I have seen the people we are helping here, they could use any help we can offer.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses do business better.

lender.name: Justin and Lexi
lender.loan_because: I think it's great to help people who want to help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: Lexi raises money for hospitals and Justin works for a bank that helps small and large business owners.

lender.loan_because: Very Good Cause and way to help people around world.
lender.occupational_info: I managed projects for a major company.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.occupational_info: I do scientific research to help protect our environment.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: A bit of help can make all the difference.

lender.name: sydney
lender.loan_because: i can, i should.

lender.name: anne marie
lender.loan_because: I respect and want to encourage women that have a more difficult life than I had
lender.occupational_info: I still work teaching russian ( I learnt it at school and lived 2 years in Russia) and french as a foreign language.

lender.name: Hancock Family
lender.loan_because: It's FUN to assist our worldwide brothers and sisters who dream and work for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: My husband works at a small university teaching biology and doing plant research. I work in our house: washing dishes, clothes, & children!

lender.name: Rian
lender.loan_because: I loan because I am blessed to have plenty to share. I want to use my loans to help support bicycle transportation and clean water projects.

lender.name: christy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference!

lender.name: Deke
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.loan_because: I want to help hard working people out so that they can be successful and happy in their lives
lender.occupational_info: I spent 40 years in the Computer Sales industry, working for IBM, Apple, Fujitsu, and small start-up companies.

lender.name: Darrell
lender.loan_because: one person can and does make a difference!

lender.occupational_info: I am a librarian at an elementary school.

lender.loan_because: I like to help people better their situation
lender.occupational_info: I work in a neighbourhood house , helping people "to improve the quality of neighbourhood life in a creative, caring way."

lender.name: Joe from bako

lender.occupational_info: I build hydraulic hoses for mobile and stationary equipment. Farm and construction items too!

lender.loan_because: we are fortunate enough to have family and friends who donated for us...and we will continue to donate.

Julie works in the "people" side of business, helping empolyees with things like benefits, conflict resolution, compensation, etc.
Art is a college professor.

lender.name: Corinne & Gianna
lender.loan_because: We don't want people to be poor. We want them to be strong and healthy.

lender.name: Nadia
lender.loan_because: In this life we cannot do great things. We can only do small things with great love. Mother Teresa John 15:9-17

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance at their dream

lender.name: scott
lender.loan_because: My daughter gave me a gift certificate ... and I've been loaning ever since
lender.occupational_info: I help clean up nuclear and hazardous waste sites

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to give women around the world the opportunity that I have to succeed. I support KIVA through my business called Linda Marcus Designs. When someone buys one of my designs it helps someone else. My gloves are called "helping hands". When they are purchased you get a cool pair of gloves and at the same time help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: My design aesthetic is a cross between Joan Jett meets Audrey Helpburn. I design clothes and leather goods.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance at a better life and I want to help people reach their goals and dreams.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: winks
lender.loan_because: "It may be that charity should begin at home, but I certainly don’t think it should end at home and I don’t think it should even tail off as steeply as it does as we move further from home. Yes, it’s great to help people around the home, but the people who are really in extreme poverty generally are not near us. And for very small sums of money, you can do enormous things in developing countries." - Peter Singer

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good idea to help small businesses start out.

lender.name: kitty
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that a lot of little donations can add up to help those with less opportunities as long as they have good work ethics.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: People to people, our best hope to change the future for good...
lender.occupational_info: Making technology simple to understand; and useful in ones life

lender.name: gilberto
lender.loan_because: I believe helping others

lender.name: jill
lender.loan_because: It allows me to connect in a personal way with places I've visited and enjoyed, or hope to visit someday.
lender.occupational_info: I explain complicated legal issues to people who aren't lawyers.

lender.name: Vieng
lender.loan_because: I care about the world as a whole.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I want to help reduce poverty and hunger one loan at a time

lender.occupational_info: As a volunteer Kiva Fellow, I help establish partnerships between Kiva and new partner microfinance institutions

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the world, even if it is a small one.

lender.name: phuong

lender.occupational_info: Tell your friends and relatives in Vietnam that YOU will support them financially for the days they join the strike. If you live outside of Vietnam, join the unions in your country and ask them to support the independent unions in Vietnam.

lender.loan_because: Want to help others to overcome the lack of avaliable funds to acheive their goals set forth in thier lifes like I have.
lender.occupational_info: Work for me is very challenging but fullfilling in a fast paced world.

lender.loan_because: I am hoping that I can make a positive difference in someone elses life.

lender.occupational_info: John makes films and Mendy directs and acts in the theatre. We are storytellers.

lender.name: Merrell
lender.loan_because: My daughter asked me to.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people succeed in supporting themselves financially.
lender.occupational_info: I help people keep records of the financial success of their business.

lender.name: Louis
lender.loan_because:
This is the power of the internet combined with grassroots social response-ability combined with microfinance combined with a good face of western capitalism.
Financial empowerment raises the status of women, raises the status of children, raises the status of the poor, spreads hope and good will and fights terrorism.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: My leadership: reflection and action group chose to take action to give back to others and we chose KIVA as our mechanism.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate all builing architecture, design and maintenance.

lender.name: Bob Harris
lender.loan_because: I can. Also, because if our situations were reversed, most of the folks receiving these loans would probably be giving them. So, fair's fair.

lender.name: Kaleen
lender.loan_because: I feel really bad for the people in the situations that they are in, and i just love to give cause it feels good. I love helping out people and i hope i can get a few buisnesses started on here! :)

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want my baby to grow up in a world of hope and opportunity for everyone
lender.occupational_info: helping restore and maintain a healthy forest on the outskirts of a big city

lender.name: Stephen & Kerry
lender.loan_because: lending rather than giving helps promote ownership and responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: We are directors of a small surveying business with 2 employees. Stephen is the land surveyor and Kerry works as office administrator.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much in my life, and it's time for me to give something back.
lender.occupational_info: Basically math, finance, statistics, and risk management. :)

lender.name: Carmel
lender.occupational_info: Helping people to live healthier lives. I love going to work every day.

lender.name: Vel
lender.loan_because: I would like to support worldwide sustainable social development.
lender.occupational_info: http://fellowsblog.kiva.org/

lender.name: Worldwide-Accom
lender.loan_because: We heard about Kiva on Frontline and were immediately impressed by this way of assisting others into financial independence in regions where entrepreneurship needs to be promoted and made a possibility. As entrepreneurs who began our own business in a relatively easy environment of Western Europe, we are honored to have the possibility to get involved in Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: Worldwide-Accom is an internet based villa and apartment rental agency.

lender.name: Haap
lender.loan_because: I have plenty, and this is a way to share this prosperity.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner and feel blessed to be able to take care of my own family by being self-employed. I love the idea of supporting people who run businesses so that they can help themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I run a health center for women and children.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to support people and good ideas.
lender.occupational_info: Developing and programming solutions that is used at the Internet.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help out smart people trying to make better lives for themselves, their family and their community - no matter where they live.
lender.occupational_info: I create computer software for businesses in the U.S.A.

lender.name: Adi&Clint
lender.loan_because: We all deserve a chance and a helping hand!

lender.name: Toddinnmpls
lender.loan_because: I believe those who have more should help those who need a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the front desk of a county govenment social service agency helping people with resources or need of financial assistance.

lender.name: jan
lender.loan_because: the kiva concept is effective, "user friendly" and educative. i'm not a keen donator because that's just not the right way i think. i feel that kiva loan is the right way to help people who just don't happen to have enough money to make their dreams come true or simply to feed themselves and their families
lender.occupational_info: i have a degree in economics and work in finance

lender.name: robert
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others in need.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe microcredit is an indispensable tool in eradicating poverty, and Kiva.org gives anybody, anywhere the opportunity to participate. Poverty can be eliminated in our lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: In short, I edit corporate news releases. I also help with development and media outreach on a volunteer basis for nonprofits with goals similar to Kiva.

lender.name: James and Jennifer
lender.loan_because: we have been given a gift to pass on to others and hope to instill in our children that gifts can keep on giving.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to be surrounded by people willing to lend me money and provide technical support when I started my own business - this is one way of passing it on.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I cannot imagine receiving anything positive in my life without giving (or in this case, lending)
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my family and household, I volunteer in my community and study art.

lender.name: Jani
lender.loan_because: If I can do some good with money I have to spare and feel like an international investment banker at the same time, it's a win-win situation.

lender.name: Huib
lender.loan_because: i have seen myself what the impact of these loans is.
lender.occupational_info: Owner of a company that structures and sells real estate investment funds and Dutch Microfund (investing in microfinance)

lender.name: Amegee
lender.occupation: Mnaging Director of MFI La Fontaine, Lomé-Togo

lender.name: Dietlinde
lender.loan_because: It was a gift from my brother

lender.name: TravelEden.com
lender.occupation: The new face of holiday rental accommodation
lender.loan_because: We want to help make a difference, establish connections and not only enable entrepreneurship but also encourage it.
lender.occupational_info: TravelEden.com allows holiday home owners to advertise their rental property using a variety of sophisticated but easy to use tools. Prospective guests can get in touch with the owners to send an enquiry instantly.

lender.name: Baymonte School
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to share God's love and help kids around the world so that they will learn about God's love for them.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.occupational_info: Academic Support Services, Ayurvedic Counselor and Yoga Teacher

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of each person's motivation for change and improvement in their life.
lender.occupational_info: Software development

lender.name: E.J.
lender.loan_because: I want to help the people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I drive people around the city on a bus

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because:
“Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today. Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime”—Author unknown
I feel that giving these loans is better than donating to charity for this reason.

lender.name: Pascal
lender.loan_because: I think lending is more active than giving and it's precious to see that the world doesn't always need banks.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: It feels good.

lender.name: Gretchen
lender.loan_because: I want to help!
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school English at an International School.

lender.name: Niranjan Karanam
lender.loan_because: To test how this works.
lender.occupational_info: Thanks to Kiva

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have enough
lender.occupational_info: healthcare

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to and because everyone deserves a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am educating myself to become a teacher.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I can and it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I run a team that sells software.

lender.name: Taffel.se
lender.loan_because: We are a losely connected network of food bloggers, foodies and friends. As many of us are happy to work with food we want to support other food lovers around the world who wants to make a future in the food business.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: It's important for each of us to help people in need. The picture I posted is of me and my 91 year old grandmother Peggy!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Rehabilitation facility in Brooksville Florida doing medical massage therapy on patients recovering from injury to their shoulders, hands, knees, etc....I work very closely with a Physical Therapist, in getting our patients well.

lender.name: Mr. Franzen
lender.loan_because: I have my class fund raise for a project when we study Latin America in our class, so we give the money to a worthy cause in Central America.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I feel it's important to give to people in need.
lender.occupational_info: House painter.

lender.name: Jens
lender.loan_because: It doesn't hurt me and helps others less fortunate a lot
lender.occupational_info: helping people to live without power cuts (or with electricity) and farmers to water their fields

lender.name: Carlo
lender.loan_because: I want to help directly rather than having charities take a large chunk of my donation.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large pharmaceutical company making new medicines. We're not all bad - my company runs a couple of schemes donating medicines to 3rd world countries.

lender.name: Monica West
lender.loan_because: the reward for helping people is feeling great.
lender.occupational_info: Actress

lender.name: Pat and Sharon
lender.loan_because: we want to help others around the world.

lender.name: KAZUHIKO
lender.occupational_info: I work in a foreign-affiliated medical equipment maker. In the company which there rents an operation tool for the backbone and sells, I do the inventory control charge of the article.

lender.name: Tanesha Bibbs
lender.loan_because: I believe in Luke 6:38: "Give, and it shall be given unto you; good measure, pressed down, and shaken together, and running over, shall men give into your bosom. For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again."

lender.name: Cindy and Walt
lender.loan_because: Sharing our wealth is the right (and Canadian) thing to do. We, my hubby and I, share because we can and should.
lender.occupational_info: We work to help keep Canada a safe, happy, helping and increasingly democratic society.

lender.name: Orlando
lender.loan_because: I love to help others

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life and also so others know Americans are concerned and really want to help deserving people.
lender.occupational_info: Telecommunications engineering and capacity planning for fiber optic phone transmissions for large contact centers

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Ernie
lender.loan_because: We're all in this thing together.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I want to enable individuals to realize their dream. I hope to empower and touch those half way cross the world that stand to benefit disproportionately more from the small loans that I can make.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student passionate about learning about other cultures, global issues, and about the lives of those in developing countries.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: Spreading prosperity makes us all more wealthy.
lender.occupational_info: I write and edit articles and web content for NASA's largest supercomputing facility.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: Someone else can get a lot more use out of my money than I can - it's just sitting in the bank!
lender.occupational_info:
I am a student majoring in atmospheric science, minoring in applied mathematics and oceanography. I'm looking forward to pursuing graduate study in either physical oceanography or climatology.
Outside of my college work, I collect data from a small weather station in my yard, and am currently writing a program to automatically analyze and archive this data.
Outside of academics, I'm a distance runner and enjoy playing guitar/bass guitar.

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: fuck obama

lender.name: Lily Thompson
lender.loan_because: I want to participate directly in a person's self-empowerment. By loaning money that enables a person to expand their own business, the person determines what they need and what to do with the money. Paying the money back enhances self-respect -- it is not a hand-out, but a helping hand.
